name: Nether Runner
description:
Nether Runner is a project I created many years ago, in the height of the Minecraft crazy. 

Nether Runner allows the player to run through the Overworld collecting items and chests.  A missed platform sends the player into the Nether where they can collect extra loot, but are required to collect 10 Obsidian blocks to return to the Overworld.  Falling in the Nether ends the game.  Nether Runner features a Day/Night cycle and various biomes.  Pick up chests to access collectibles:  skins, items and audio.  Though all the assets have been created, only some of the collectibles currently have an affect on game play.

Many of the skins in the game are those of previously well known Minecraft Youtubers.  I have no intentions of continuing with this project, so I am releasing for fun.

Enjoy!
